content:
Just for a demo, I used a hashtag icon and a shade of purple color on an icon, which opens a modal of bots streams subscription list with an unsubscribe button, same as the streams tab from the full profile modal, didn't post a screenshot of modal because little CSS work is left to do.

Screenshot-from-2022-08-02-21-44-24.png

Alya Abbott Any suggestion for an icon and its color?
Hmm, why not just have a "open full profile modal" button, and then one can click to the subscriptions tab from there?
Certainly I think we'd prefer to reuse the existing modal rather than making a new one with similar functionality, since every additional screen we create is extra maintenance.
(Or if we want to have it take to you to that tab, we can open the full profile modal with that tab already selected with a # style button)

Yeah, it works, thanks for the suggestion.

full_profile_modal_from_bot_card.gif
Added this feature by this commit in this already existing PR as it is related
Cool, I'll add that to my near-term review queue.
